!
! Cisco IOS Edge Cases Configuration
! Covers: MOTD/login/exec banners, empty blocks, comments, dial-peer, telephony-service
!
hostname EDGE-CASES-RTR
!
! This is a comment line
! Multiple comment lines in a row
!
banner motd ^
*************************************************************
*                                                           *
*   AUTHORIZED ACCESS ONLY                                  *
*                                                           *
*   Unauthorized access to this device is prohibited.       *
*   All activities are logged and monitored.                *
*                                                           *
*************************************************************
^
!
banner login ^
===========================================================
           Login Banner - Authentication Required
===========================================================
^
!
banner exec ^
Welcome to $(hostname)
You are connected from $(line)
^
!
interface GigabitEthernet0/0
 description Empty block - no commands
!
interface GigabitEthernet0/1
 ! Comment inside interface block
 description Has inline comment
 ip address 10.0.0.1 255.255.255.0
!
interface GigabitEthernet0/2
 shutdown
!
telephony-service
 max-ephones 100
 max-dn 200
 ip source-address 10.1.1.1 port 2000
 create cnf-files version-stamp Jan 01 2024 00:00:00
!
ephone-dn 1
 number 1001
 name Extension 1001
!
ephone-dn 2
 number 1002
 name Extension 1002
!
ephone 1
 mac-address 0011.2233.4455
 type 7960
 button 1:1 2:2
!
dial-peer voice 100 voip
 description Outbound to PSTN
 destination-pattern 9.........
 session protocol sipv2
 session target ipv4:10.1.2.1
 codec g711ulaw
!
dial-peer voice 200 pots
 description FXO Port 1
 destination-pattern 8T
 port 0/0/0
!
voice register global
 mode cme
 source-address 10.1.1.1 port 2000
 max-dn 200
 max-pool 100
!
voice register dn 1
 number 2001
 name SIP Phone 1
!
voice register pool 1
 id mac 0011.2233.4466
 number 1 dn 1
 codec g711ulaw
!
controller T1 0/0/0
 framing esf
 linecode b8zs
 cablelength short 110
!
! Final comment before end
!
end
